body: The folder problem was introduced by me in #4338, see #4376, and the `dir '\x00'` I do not understand and I don't think it is due to these changes.

issue.title: lib/model: Fix minor logging regression and inconsistency of #4338 (ref #4375)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age

labels.name: pr-merged
labels.description: Legacy label used in the past for pull requests merged to the main tree

issue.body: In #4338, the added line logged to info level used `%q` instead of `%v` and the existing line wasn't changed to use `f.Description()` for consistency.

issue.title: Puller inspecting strange directories

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
The thing is that the synchronization is also not working anymore. Is it really about changed logging or is there something deeper hidden in that logs?

My next log lines are:

```
4QJNC] 09:13:20 INFO: Folder "BTSync" isn't making progress. Pausing puller for 1m0s.
[4QJNC] 09:13:26 INFO: Folder "BTSync" error is cleared, restarting
[4QJNC] 09:13:32 INFO: Folder "BTSync" error is cleared, restarting
[4QJNC] 09:13:37 INFO: Folder "BTSync" error is cleared, restarting
```

The sync really does not make any progress: I don't see the new files on this machine.
Please use forum for support. This is purely a cosmetical change.
